backend/main.mo: Defines event comparisons and core types for competitions, payments, profiles, sessions, attempts, and results inside the main actor.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that adds Ao5 calculation to stored results by transforming old result entries into the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing required behavior for session start/resume logic and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and recent behavioral changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining CSS variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/env.json: Public config exposing the backend canister ID.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Razorpay payment configuration including keyId, currency, company info, and theme settings.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Manual QA checklist covering authentication, admin access, competitions, leaderboards, and user management.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user-friendly strings through a normalizeError helper.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable React Query keys for competitions, profiles, results, admin data, and solve sessions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, React Query client, theme provider, and application shell.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: UI component for selecting competition pricing modes and editing fee values, emitting a FeeMode object.
Protects admin-only pages by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading or denial screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login/logout with Internet Identity and clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content requiring authentication, showing a loading state or login prompt if not signed in.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Clickable card displaying competition details and status, navigating to its detail page.
Main layout with header, navigation, auth controls, admin link, and mobile menu wrapper around routed content.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitor names, Ao5, and individual solve times with navigation to profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays a user's payment history with sorting, loading/error states, and detailed purchase cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a user profile dropdown with account info, navigation links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for initial profile setup, allowing users to enter email and display name before creating their profile.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements a 15‑second inspection timer with scramble visibility toggle and callbacks for start and completion.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a post‑solve completion screen with navigation options and instructions for video evidence submission.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Provides an interactive solve timer that measures time, handles start/stop states, and reports completion.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: UI component showing an actor initialization error with retry and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads and caches Razorpay config from a JSON file with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor based on identity and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a browser beforeunload warning when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor once available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages state and execution of a multi‑step simulated deployment process with diagnostics and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity management via AuthClient.
Blocks browser back navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for competitions, results, payments, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Computes average of 5 (Ao5) times handling penalties and DNF logic.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Helpers for determining if a competition is paid and formatting pricing details.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Generates CSV content from results, escapes fields, and triggers file downloads; also provides generic CSV creation and download helpers.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable dates and date-times using US locale settings.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates a multi-step deployment process with optional random failures and provides error normalization utilities.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for environment files, payment config, network reachability, and build artifacts, returning detailed failures.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay checkout script and opens the payment UI using config values and provided order details.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab-scoped solve session tokens in sessionStorage, providing store, retrieve, clear, and existence-check helpers.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds with centiseconds and returns DNF for invalid or too-large values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Lists all competitions for admins with actions to create, edit, delete, lock, and activate competitions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create a competition, including events, scrambles, dates, limits, and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition’s details, events, scrambles, and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs deployment preflight checks and step-by-step deployment to production with diagnostics tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard offering navigation to manage users, competitions, results, and quick actions like creating competitions or going live.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Lets admins filter, view, hide/show, and export competition results for specific competitions and events.
Admin page that lists all users and provides actions to block, delete, reset competition status, and view solve history using various admin mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting or resuming solve sessions.
Displays competitions fetched from the API, grouped by running, upcoming, and completed, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows a competition’s leaderboard with event selection, ranking, and formatted solve data, handling loading and missing-competition states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Lists all competitions with status and date info, linking to their leaderboards and requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides authenticated users a profile editor with fields for display name, country, and gender plus access to payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Displays a public competitor profile along with aggregated event results and basic stats, handling loading and not-found cases.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the full solve flow including inspection, timing, penalties, scramble fetching, and result submission for a competition event.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-specific types including result inputs, public profile info, and user summary structures.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Extends backend types with additional competition, result, leaderboard, profile, and session-related interfaces not exported by the generated backend.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, event lists, and a default event for use across the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state, architecture notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the full-stack competition platform.
